but <S%G235><s%> <S%G2532><s%> having suffered before <S%G4310><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> been shamefully treated, <S%G5195><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> you know, <S%G1492><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Philippi, <S%G5375><s%> we grew bold <S%G3955><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> to tell <S%G2980><s%> <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> the Good News <S%G2098><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> conflict. <S%G73><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> exhortation <S%G3874><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> error, <S%G4106><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> uncleanness, <S%G167><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> deception. <S%G1388><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> we have been approved <S%G1381><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> to be entrusted with <S%G4100><s%> the Good News, <S%G2098><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> we speak; <S%G2980><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> pleasing <S%G700><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> but <S%G235><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> tests <S%G1381><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> hearts. <S%G2588><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> were we <S%G1096><s%> at any time <S%G4218><s%> found using words <S%G3056><s%> of flattery, <S%G2850><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> you know, <S%G1492><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> a cloak <S%G4392><s%> of covetousness <S%G4124><s%> (God <S%G2316><s%> is witness <S%G3144><s%>),

nor <S%G3777><s%> seeking glory <S%G1391><s%> from men <S%G444><s%> (neither <S%G3777><s%> from <S%G575><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> from <S%G575><s%> others <S%G243><s%>), when we might <S%G1410><s%> have <S%G1511><s%> claimed <S%G1722><s%> authority <S%G922><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> we were <S%G1096><s%> gentle <S%G2261><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> like <S%G302><s%> <S%G5613><s%> a nursing <S%G5162><s%> mother cherishes <S%G2282><s%> her <S%G1438><s%> own children. <S%G5043><s%>

Even so, <S%G3779><s%> affectionately longing <S%G2442><s%> for you, <S%G5216><s%> we were well pleased <S%G2106><s%> to impart <S%G3330><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the Good News <S%G2098><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> our own <S%G1438><s%> souls, <S%G5590><s%> because <S%G1360><s%> you had become <S%G1096><s%> very dear <S%G27><s%> to us. <S%G2254><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> you remember, <S%G3421><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> labor <S%G2873><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> travail; <S%G3449><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> working <S%G2038><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> that <S%G4314><s%> we might <S%G1912><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> burden <S%G1912><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of you, <S%G5216><s%> we preached <S%G2784><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> the Good News <S%G2098><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

You <S%G5210><s%> are witnesses <S%G3144><s%> with <S%G2532><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> how <S%G5613><s%> holy, <S%G3743><s%> <S%G2532><s%> righteously, <S%G1346><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blamelessly <S%G274><s%> we behaved ourselves <S%G1096><s%> toward you <S%G5213><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> believe. <S%G4100><s%>

As <S%G2509><s%> you know, <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5613><s%> we exhorted, <S%G3870><s%> <S%G2532><s%> comforted, <S%G3888><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> implored <S%G3140><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of you, <S%G5216><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a father <S%G3962><s%> does his <S%G1438><s%> own children, <S%G5043><s%>

to the end that <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> should walk <S%G4043><s%> worthily <S%G516><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> calls <S%G2564><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> own Kingdom <S%G932><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>

For <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> thank <S%G2168><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> without ceasing, <S%G89><s%> that, <S%G3754><s%> when you received <S%G3880><s%> from us <S%G2257><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> the message of <S%G3844><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> you accepted <S%G1209><s%> it not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> but, <S%G235><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> in truth, <S%G230><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> works <S%G1754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> who believe. <S%G4100><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> you, <S%G5210><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> imitators <S%G3402><s%> of the assemblies <S%G1577><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus; <S%G2424><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> suffered <S%G3958><s%> the same things <S%G5024><s%> from <S%G5259><s%> your own <S%G2398><s%> countrymen, <S%G4853><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> they <S%G846><s%> did from <S%G5259><s%> the Jews; <S%G2453><s%>

who <S%G3588><s%> killed <S%G615><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their own <S%G2398><s%> prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drove <S%G1559><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> out, <S%G2532><s%> and didn't <S%G3361><s%> please <S%G700><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> are contrary <S%G1727><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men; <S%G444><s%>

forbidding <S%G2967><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> to the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they may be saved; <S%G4982><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> fill up <S%G378><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> always. <S%G3842><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> has come <S%G5348><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the uttermost. <S%G5056><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> we, <S%G2249><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> being bereaved <S%G642><s%> of <S%G575><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> a short <S%G5610><s%> season, <S%G2540><s%> in presence, <S%G4383><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in heart, <S%G2588><s%> tried <S%G4704><s%> even harder <S%G4056><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> desire, <S%G4314><s%>

because <S%G1352><s%> we wanted <S%G2309><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to you <S%G5209><s%> — indeed, <S%G3303><s%> I, <S%G1473><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> once <S%G530><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G1364><s%> — but <S%G2532><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> hindered <S%G1465><s%> us. <S%G2532><s%>
